text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://ehelse.no/fhir/CodeSystem/no-kodeverk-7010-norpat
  • Include all codes defined in http://ehelse.no/fhir/CodeSystem/no-kodeverk-7270-ncrp
  • Include all codes defined in http://ehelse.no/fhir/CodeSystem/no-kodeverk-7280-nlk
  • Include all codes defined in http://ehelse.no/fhir/CodeSystem/no-kodeverk-8212

name: InvestigationSpec_VS
title: Investigation Spec VS
description: Codes used to specify individual investigations regarding methods used.
